description:
Sandoz, the generic pharmaceuticals division of Novartis, is a global leader in the rapidly growing generics industry, is now looking for Head of Novartis Russia Corporate University.


 

Responsibilities:

  • Development of corporate cross-divisional L&D activities aligned with company business strategy
  • Maintenance and development of Novartis Russia Corporate University (development of L&D programs, policies & procedures, learning & assessment tools) in order to assist the whole company and business divisions to deliver key business objectives
  • Monitoring of all L&D activities to be aligned with Novartis Russia policies & procedures
  • Team management and motivation


 

Requirements:

  • Higher education in HR/Business/Economics, etc (additional HR qualification will be an advantage)
  • Experience on similar HR positions from 3-5 years (in western FMCG / pharmaceutical companies)
  • Fluent English
  • Experienced in developing & delivering trainings & assessment tools for top- and middle-management
  • Advanced PC user
  • L&D services providers' knowledge
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills, interpersonally savvy, analytical skills, quick-learner within changing environment, politically agile, excellent in planning, goal setting and execution 
  • Team player, results driven


 

Compensation & benefits:

  • Attractive base pay and annual bonus
  • Excellent compensation & benefits package
  • Professional development opportunities within one of the largest global pharmaceutical companies.
name: Head of Novartis Russia Corporate University
